page.title: 14FARMING IN IDE.
page.content: {NEW BUILDINGS,IDE}This farm has been owned by the Perhams for the past 65 yrs.When they bought it was 2 small holdings.The land is owned by the church commissioners.8 people live on the farm & there is 1 other full time worker,but about 8 seasonal workers. Mr. Perham enjoys growing his own vegetables but the rest of the food supplies are bought in Exeter.He also likes shooting & reading in any spare time.For family transport they have 4 cars and some bicycles.The farm covers 135 acres & there are 15 fields. Usually 3 fields are used for crops & the rest for live stock.Mr. Perham is a dairy farmer and has friesian cows,Sussex cross border & Leicester sheep & Marengo chickens.Mr.Perham allows people to walk across his fields as long as dogs are kept on leads.
